message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,450,000. I believe this reflects its true worth and potential.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,300,000.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. I'm confident in the value this product brings. How about we meet halfway at $1,375,000? This feels like a fair compromise that reflects the product's worth.
Thank you for your proposal, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to suggest a counteroffer of $1,325,000.
Bob, you clearly see the value in this product. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,350,000, but I can't go any lower than that. This is a fantastic deal on a truly unique product.
I understand your position, Alice. Given my financial constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,330,000.
